chinese: 我每天都买报纸, 而且我, um, 一般地会买我们市发行量最大的两份报纸，
english: I buy newspapers every day and I, um, naturally buy the two largest serving newspapers of the city,

chinese: 《Boston环球报》和《Boston先驱报》,
english: the Boston Globe and the Boston Herald,

chinese: 不过我真正喜欢的是我们每周发行一次的社区报, 因为这份报纸的主要内容都是关于剑桥市的消息，而我就住在这个城市。
english: but what I truly love are our weekly community newspapers that really focus on the city of Cambridge, which is where I live.

chinese: 我看报一般都会先直接翻到财经版, 然后也许会看看"都市版",
english: I mainly go right to the business section and then after that maybe the "metro",

chinese: 我喜欢看的, 比如那些统计指标说了什么, 有关行家说了些什么,
english: what I'd like to see, what the indicators are saying, all the smart people are saying,

chinese: 就是去了解行情以及一般的经济动向.
english: just to kind of be in the know, in the flow of the money.

chinese: 我一般先看国际新闻, 然后会翻看"都市版"的新闻和体育动态.
english: International news, and then I'll go to "metro" news and sports.

chinese: 我一般有什么报就看什么报, ah, 对报纸名称什么的并不太挑剔.
english: I usually pick up whatever is available, ah, not particular in terms of any brands or anything like that.

chinese: 我因为经常出门在外, 所以不管是《Miami先驱报》, 《Chicago论坛报》, 还是《今日美国》, 对我来说没太大区别.
english: I travel a lot, so whether it's the Miami Herald or the Chicago Tribune or USA Today, doesn't make that much difference.

chinese: 我喜欢听公共电台的广播, it's, um, 范围较广, 对新闻内容的解释较为令人满意,
english: I like public radio broadcast, it's, um, good coverage, good explanations of the news,

chinese: 有时新闻提要后的具体内容比报纸更为详细, 而且也比报纸更及时.
english: facts behind the headlines in greater detail than the newspaper sometimes and ahead of the newspaper too.

chinese: 我还是觉得报纸最好.
english: I think newspapers are the best.

chinese: 如果排队的话, 我觉得电视也许该排在最后.
english: I think probably on the bottom end of the scale is TV.

chinese: 电视里更多的是娱乐节目.
english: It's more entertainment.

chinese: 我听电台广播听得很多, er, 尤其是公共电台的广播,
english: I listen to a lot of radio and, er, especially the public radio,

chinese: er, 我喜欢有深度的报道, 这是我获得消息的主要来源, 其次就是电视了.
english: er, I like the reporting in depth, that's where I get most of my news and then the TV.

chinese: 当你拿起报纸的时候, 不管是哪种报纸, you know, 这些报纸,
english: When you pick up newspapers, whether it's, you know, these particular newspapers,

chinese: 你会产生这样一种感觉, 我们的国家是这个星球上唯一的国家.
english: you would think that we're the only country on this planet.

chinese: Um, 偶尔, 你也会看到一点儿, um, 关于Bosnia的消息或其他一些消息,
english: Um, once in a while, you pick up something, um, in Bosnia or whatever,

chinese: 但是, er, 大多数还是倾向于美国的新闻.
english: but, er, for the most part it's very slanted to US.
